name: expensify-cli
description: A CLI tool to manage transactions and generate reports regarding your expenses

scripts.prettier-check: pnpm exec prettier . --check || echo "Prettier: All files are already formatted."
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && pnpm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch && pnpm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && pnpm publish && git push && git push --tags
